Class CircularBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • CircularBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Buffer

    public class CircularBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Buffer
    This class implements a circular buffer using locks and conditions. Note: This class was built by modifying the circular buffer class designed in Figure 23.18 of Deitel and Deitel's Java How to Program Eary Objects.
    Author:
    Sophia Mallaro
    See Also:
    CircularBuffer
